<div class="dm-template dm-menu menu1-631 sticky custom-block" component-id="809" dm-template="custom.menu_menu1_5307438215240836"><nav class="menu  sticky   column-2 ">
  <div class="section-bg" style="background-color: #ffffff; opacity: 1"></div>
  <ul class="sections">
    <li class="logo  ">
      <a href="">
        <img alt="Designmodo" height="25" src="http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/patron1.png">
      </a>
    </li>
    <li class="right">
      <a class="button  font-size-1  line-height-1 " style="border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: #424242;  font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #424242; " href="#contact">
        Get in touch
      </a>
    </li>

</nav></div>

<div class="dm-template dm-cover custom-block" component-id="805" dm-template="custom.cover_cover1_9126003745477646"><section class="cover parallax left middle  " style="background-color: #ffffff">
  <div class="container-holder">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="holder">
        <div class="content">
          <h1 style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(51, 51, 51);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" line-height-1  font-size-2 ">
            <span style="font-weight: normal;">Storm Management</span>
          </h1>
          <p style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(84, 84, 84);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" hero  font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
            The world renowned modelling agency known for finding, developing and managing the careers of some of the most infamous and exciting modelling talent such as Kate Moss, Cara Delevingne and Jourdan Dunn asked us to reinvigorate their brand and online presence.
          </p>
          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; color: #c4b0d4; ">
            <a class="button stroke  font-size-3  line-height-2 " style="border-width: 2px; border-style: solid; border-color: #c4b0d4; " href="#what-we-did">
              What We Did
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="backgroud-wrapper">
    <div class="background-holder">
      <div class="background" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/storm-mobile1.jpg);"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="section-bg" style="background-color: #ffffff; opacity: 0"></div>
  </div>
</section></div>

<div class="dm-template dm-grid grid2-737 custom-block" component-id="842" dm-template="custom.grid_grid2_6131865812931210"><section class="grid column-3 image-3 top-padding-5 bottom-padding-10 " id="what-we-did">
  <div class="section-bg section-color" style="background-color: #ffffff; opacity: 1;"></div>
  <div class="container">
    <h1 style=" font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" line-height-1  font-size-4 ">
      <span style="font-weight: normal;">What We Did</span>
    </h1>
    <ul class="grid-list">
      <li class="image-grid-item ">
        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/storm-logo.jpg)"></div>
        <div class="description-holder">
          <div>
            <div>
              <h3 style=" color: rgb(84, 84, 84);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                BRANDING
              </h3>
              <p style=" color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                As Storm’s business had changed to be more than model and artist management, and into the 21st Century with YouTube and blogging stars. Storm needed to reinvigorate their brand identity.
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="image-grid-item ">
        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/storm-website3.jpg)"></div>
        <div class="description-holder">
          <div>
            <div>
              <h3 style=" color: rgb(84, 84, 84);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                WEBSITE
              </h3>
              <p style=" color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                Lack of refreshes to the website had taken it’s toll. It had not been updated in a few years and it wasn’t optimised for mobile phones and tablets.
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="image-grid-item ">
        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/storm-ecasting.jpg)"></div>
        <div class="description-holder">
          <div>
            <div>
              <h3 style=" color: rgb(84, 84, 84);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                E-CASTING
              </h3>
              <p style=" color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; " class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                Their internal casting application was slow, a pain to use and was missing key elements of functionality. It also suffered the same issues as the website, it wasn’t compatible on mobiles and tablets.
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</section></div>

<div
    class="dm-template dm-grid grid4-185"

        <section class="grid column-3 image-1 top-padding-12 bottom-padding-12 ">
                                        <div
                    class="section-bg section-color"
                    style="background-color: #ffffff; opacity: 1;"></div>
                            <div class="container">
                                                                        <h1
                                style=" font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                class=" font-size-6  line-height-7 ">
                            <span style="font-weight: normal;">Our Process</span>
                        </h1>
                                                                                                    <ul  class="grid-list">
                                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">
                                                            <a href="#" >
                                                                                                                                        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/Discover.jpg)"></div>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <div class="description-holder">
                                            <div>
                                                <div>
                                                                                                                                                                        <h3
                                                                    style=" color: rgb(66, 66, 66);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                                                DISCOVER
                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-7 ">
                                                                Our clients are experts in their industry. We spend time finding out the detail in the problem through stakeholder interviews, group discussions, desk research and user testing.


                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                                               </a>
                                                    </li>
                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">

                                                                    class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                                                COLLABORATE
                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-7 ">
                                                                The best ideas are shared. We encourage iterative and collaborative lines of communication to develop the best ideas through sketching, rapid prototyping, wireframing and gradual iteration.&nbsp;
                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                                               </a>
                                                    </li>
                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">

                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(143, 143, 143);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-7 ">
                                                                One size doesn’t fit all and buzzwords can be dangerous. We’re technology and platform agnostic. It's about finding the right solution to a problem, not the latest tech trend.
                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

<div
    class="dm-template dm-grid grid5-553"
            dm-template="grid.grid5"
        component-id="553"
    >
        <section class="grid column-3 image-1 top-padding-3 bottom-padding-4 ">
                                        <div
                    class="section-bg section-color"
                    style="background-color: #ffffff; opacity: 1;"></div>
                            <div class="container">
                                                                                                                <p
                                style=" color: rgb(108, 108, 108);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                class=" hero  font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                            We are currently updating our portfolio. Here is a taster of the other brands we work with.
                        </p>
                                                            <ul  class="grid-list">
                                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">
                                                            <a href="http://www.waven.co.uk/" >
                                                                                                                                        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/waven.jpg)"></div>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <div class="description-holder">
                                            <div>
                                                <div>
                                                                                                                                                                        <h3
                                                                    style=" color: rgb(66, 66, 66);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                                                WÅVEN
                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(108, 108, 108);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                                                                A Scandinavian-inspired jeans brand with big ambitions. We partnered with them from the beginning, creating their brand identity and creating and managing their ecommerce store and platform.
                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; color: #c4b0d4; ">
                                        <p
                                            class="url  font-size-4  line-height-4 ">

                                        </p>
                                    </div>

                                                    </li>
                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">
                                                            <a href="http://www.mandpmodels.com/" >
                                                                                                                                        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/3-mandp-note-pad.jpg)"></div>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <div class="description-holder">
                                            <div>
                                                <div>
                                                                                                                                                                        <h3
                                                                    style=" color: rgb(66, 66, 66);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                                                M±P&nbsp;
                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(108, 108, 108);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                                                                As a boutique modelling agency, they needed a new identity that would differentiate them from their competitors. We developed a brand identity that was young and fun, as well as an online presence.
                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; color: #c4b0d4; ">

                                        </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                                           </a>
                                                    </li>
                                            <li class="image-grid-item ">
                                                            <a href="http://www.rosemaryferguson.co.uk" >
                                                                                                                                        <div class="image" style="background-image: url(http://patron.wpengine.com/wp-content/plugins/qards/../../uploads/2015/03/rosemary.jpg)"></div>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <div class="description-holder">
                                            <div>
                                                <div>
                                                                                                                                                                        <h3
                                                                    style=" color: rgb(66, 66, 66);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                                                ROSEMARY FERGUSON
                                                            </h3>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p
                                                                    style=" text-align: left;  color: rgb(108, 108, 108);  font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; "
                                                                    class=" font-size-1  line-height-4 ">
                                                                A talented nutritionist, author, model and mum. With her new book launching in April 2015, Rosemary asked us to help her create a brand identity and website that would make her advice easy to digest. 
                                                            </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: 'Sofia Pro', sans-serif; color: #c4b0d4; ">
                                        <p
                                            class="url  font-size-4  line-height-4 ">
                                            www.rosemaryferguson.co.uk
                                        </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                                           </a>
                                                    </li>
                                                </ul>
        </div>
    </section>
    </div>
